title: Multiply first terms
text: Use FOIL. The acronym is First, Outer, Inner, Last. Multiply the first terms of each binomial

title: Multiply outer terms
text: Multiply the two outer terms of the binomial, which is the first term of the first binomial, and the second term of the second binomial.

title: Multiply inner terms
text: Multiply the two inner terms, which are the second term of the first binomial, and the first term of the second binomial.

title: Multiply last terms
text: Multiply the last terms of the two binomials together.

title: Add it all
text: Now, add all the terms together, combining like terms where possible.
